description: Multi-platform content creator producing engaging videos, images, and written content using AI tools for social media, marketing, and digital platforms

SKL-062.skill_phrase: engineered prompts for AI content generation via Google AI Studio

SKL-063.skill_phrase: synthesized information from AI-generated content via Google AI Studio

SKL-064.skill_phrase: crafted visual storytelling through AI-animated videos via Google AI Studio

tool_details.TOOL-AI-222: Google AI Studio - PRIMARY tool (daily use) - AI content generation and video creation

workflow_details.WRF-021: Create Social Media Caption - Generate engaging captions with AI
workflow_details.WRF-022: Summarize YouTube Video - Extract key insights from videos
workflow_details.WRF-023: Generate Video from Image - Animate still images into video clips

object_details.OBJ-SMM-015: Social Media Caption - AI-generated event announcements and captions
object_details.OBJ-SMM-016: Video Summary - Bullet-point summaries of YouTube videos
object_details.OBJ-VID-003: Animated Video Clip - AI-generated video from still images

typical_tasks: Generate social media captions for events and announcements
Summarize educational videos for content curation
Create animated video clips from product photos
Develop engaging visual content for social platforms
Research and synthesize information from multiple sources
